data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1.2 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 Public Beta 4
data.actual_result: Channel is hidden and doesn't appear instantly. You need to change the view to see it or reload the app.
data.short_description: Channels within collapsed categories with new mentions or messages do not appear instantly
data.steps_to_repro: - Collapse a category with at least one channel (e.g. channel `#test`) - Get a new message or mention in `#test` - Make sure you have other channel in the same server opened and not `#test` - Observe the channel list
